Test Name: Antithrombin Activity, Plasma (with reflex to Antithrombin Antigen)
Purpose: To measure antithrombin activity in plasma and, when activity is abnormal, reflexively determine antithrombin antigen levels for accurate, reliable, and reproducible assessment.
Equipment: Clotting Time Analyzer, chromogenic antithrombin activity assay kit, immunoassay antithrombin antigen kit
